instructions: Open the Activity app on your iPhone. Tap a date in the calendar to see a breakdown for that day. Watch for achievement awards when you get an achievement notification, scroll down to see the award, then drag your finger on the award to see it from all angles.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Activity.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Activity. Turn off Daily Coaching.
